## Command Description
### tatcli system -h

```
System commands (admin only): tatcli system [<command>]

Usage:
  tatcli system [command]

Aliases:
  system, sys


Available Commands:
  cacheclean  Clean Cache: tatcli system cacheclean
  cacheinfo   Info on Cache: tatcli system cacheinfo
```
